Header.name: MacAdress
Header.description: Mac address of WIFI-Module for unique identification.

Header.name: ProtocolV
Header.description: Protocol Version. Constantly 'V2'. Can be changed for new versions

Header.name: Status
Header.description: Reserved for status informations like LW6/9. Constantly empty ''

Info.name: OperationT
Info.description: Total operating time in 5min resolution e.g. 1 = 5min, 12 = 60min

Info.name: DiscIonT
Info.description: Operation time since last change of Silber-Ionen-Rades in 5min resolution.

Info.name: CleaningT
Info.description: Operation time since last cleaning in 5min resolution.

Info.name: ServiceT
Info.description: Counter of Operation hours since last Service reset, 10min resolution.

Info.name: Warnings
Info.description: Displayed warnings on the display. Values are bit coded. Several Values can be displayed at once.

Measure.name: Temperature
Measure.description: Measured temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit depending on the Units parameter in State

Measure.name: WaterLevel
Measure.description: Water level in the tank. 0=No measured value

Measure.name: _waterThreashold
Measure.description: Water Threashold Value. No App/Cloud unit.
